flawed_nl_solution:
The hunting season last 12/4=<<12/4=3>>3 months
So he goes hunting 3*6=<<3*6=18>>18 times a year
That means he gets 18*2=<<18*2=36>>36 deers per year
So he catches 36*600=<<36*600=12600>>12600 pounds of deer a year
That means he keeps 12600/2=<<12600/2=6300>>6300 pounds of deer a year
#### 6300

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21600, not 12600. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
